duties_responsibilities.duty: Stack and pile finished goods onto pallets, and prepare goods for shipment.
Package products specific to customer requests.
Clean and prepare area for proper handling of finish goods.
Perform audits to ensure quality and remove defective finished goods from the packaging area.
Maintain paperwork of packages and follow direction.
Take direction from multiple resources while training to become an operator.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma/GED or equivalent experience
